data.title: A Monologue from the film The Magnificent Ambersons by Orson Welles
data.meta_description: A casting calls, auditions resource and talent database. Monologues and scenes for training and auditions. Blogs and forums about acting and entertainment. Actors can create a free profile as well as directors, casting directors, producers and agents/managers. Join today, its free.
data.text: NARRATOR: "The magnificence of the Ambersons began in 1873. Their splendor lasted throughout all the years that saw their Midland town spread and darken into a city. In that town in those days, all the women who wore silk or velvet knew all the other women who wore silk or velvet and everybody knew everybody else's family horse and carriage....."
